00020 using namespace Wt;
00021 
00022 HarixApp::HarixApp( const WEnvironment& env ) : WApplication(env)
00023 {
00024   setTitle("HariX");
00025   setCssTheme("polished"); // use the polished theme folder from /resources/themes/
00026   useStyleSheet("resources/stylizr.css");
00027 
00028   // Common stack to hold any pages..
00029   stackedContent_ = new WStackedWidget(root());
00030 
00031   // Create an HomeWidget(representing the home page) instance
00032   HomeWidget* home_page = HomeWidget::Instance(stackedContent_);
00033   WApplication::instance()->setInternalPath("/home",true); // set URL to /application_path.wt#/home
00034 
00035   /*
00036     WApplication::internalPathChanged signal connected to the HarixApp::internalPathChanged.
00037     So any URL change will trigger HarixApp::internalPathChanged function!
00038   */
00039   wApp->internalPathChanged().connect(SLOT(this, HarixApp::internalPathChanged));
00040 }
00041 
00042 void HarixApp::setWidget( WContainerWidget* widget )
00043 {
00044   // sets the current visual widget of stackedContent_ while hiding the other widgets
00045   stackedContent_->setCurrentWidget( widget );
00046 }
00047 
00048 void HarixApp::removeWidget( WContainerWidget* widget )
00049 {
00050   // Deletes the passed widget from stackedContent_
00051   stackedContent_->removeWidget( widget );
00052 }
00053

00056 
00061 void selectWidget( WContainerWidget* widget )
00062 {
00063   (dynamic_cast<HarixApp*>(WApplication::instance()))->setWidget(widget);
00064 }

00073 void removeWidget( WContainerWidget* widget )
00074 {
00075   (dynamic_cast<HarixApp*>(WApplication::instance()))->removeWidget(widget);
00076 }

00080 void HarixApp::internalPathChanged(const std::string& path)
00081 {
00082   // Define pointers to widgets(pages) to be shown
00083   HomeWidget* home_page;
00084   AnalyzeOsWidget* analyze_page;
00085   PcimapQueryWidget* querydev_page;
00086   PcimapResultWidget* queryresult_page;
00087   MainboardsWidget* mainboards_page;
00088 
00089   /*
00090    * Reset pages on URL changes to their defaults!
00091    * @{
00092    */
00093   if ( (analyze_page = AnalyzeOsWidget::Instance()) != NULL ){
00094     analyze_page->resetAll();
00095   }
00096   if ( (querydev_page = PcimapQueryWidget::Instance()) != NULL ){
00097     querydev_page->resetAll();
00098   }
00099   if ( (queryresult_page = PcimapResultWidget::Instance()) != NULL ){
00100     queryresult_page->resetAll(); // Deletes the widget, PcimapResultWidget is recreated in every call.
00101   }
00102   if ( (mainboards_page = MainboardsWidget::Instance()) != NULL ){
00103     mainboards_page->resetAll(); // Deletes the widget, MainboardsWidget is recreated in every call.
00104   }
00105   /*
00106    * @}
00107    */
00108 
00109   
00110   /*
00111    * React appropriately to page requests
00112    * @{
00113    */
00114   if( path == "/home"){
00115     if ( (home_page = HomeWidget::Instance()) != NULL )
00116       selectWidget( home_page );    // Show the home page
00117     else{
00118       wApp->log("debug") << "This should not happen!!!";
00119       assert(0);                    // Kill the application
00120     }
00121   }
00122   else if( path == "/analyze_os"){
00123     if ( ( analyze_page = AnalyzeOsWidget::Instance()) == NULL )
00124       selectWidget( AnalyzeOsWidget::Instance(stackedContent_) ); // Add widget to StackedWidget and select it..
00125     else
00126       selectWidget( analyze_page );
00127   }
00128   else if( path == "/query_devices"){
00129     if ( ( querydev_page = PcimapQueryWidget::Instance()) == NULL )
00130       selectWidget( PcimapQueryWidget::Instance(stackedContent_) ); // Add widget to StackedWidget and select it.
00131     else
00132       selectWidget( querydev_page );
00133   }
00134   else if( path == "/query_results"){
00135     // Don't allow direct URL access to PcimapResultWidget, and redirect to PcimapQueryWidget.
00136     WApplication::instance()->setInternalPath("/query_devices",true);
00137   }
00138   else if( path == "/mainboards"){
00139     if ( (mainboards_page = MainboardsWidget::Instance()) == NULL )
00140       selectWidget( MainboardsWidget::Instance(stackedContent_) ); // Add widget to StackedWidget and select it..
00141     else
00142       selectWidget( mainboards_page );
00143   }
00144   /*
00145    * @}
00146    */
00147 
00148 }
